pages.title: Orange-Lined Triggerfish
pages.text: The orange-lined triggerfish ($(o)Balistapus undulatus$()) is a demersal triggerfish.$(br2)Although Balistapus is a monotypic genus, it is closely related to the genus Balistoides.

pages.title: Orange-Lined Triggerfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
